name: MadLab
tagline: Action Role-Playing Game Encouraging Young People to Explore Computer Science
body:
### Welcome to MADLAB.

MADLAB is an action role-playing game designed to encourage young people to explore computer science. The game encourages experimentation and exploration by refraining from prescriptive tutorials or direct instruction, while introducing the player to basic programming concepts such as variables and conditions.

### Authors and Contributors
Developed by Aaron Ceross (@aceross), Mallory Earnshaw (@makow), Maria Arenas (@ma14582), Mary Lin (@minidietcoke), @JamesCollerton, and Sam Low (@s-low) at the University of Bristol, UK.

### Pages Documentation
http://help.github.com/pages
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
